message: Let's be fair and split the money 60-40. It's a good deal for both of us!
Your offer was tempting, Alice, but let's be even fairer. How about a 55/45 split in your favor?  The clock is ticking and the money is losing value.
Considering the inflation, I think I've been generous enough. I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer. 57/43 is a fair deal. Don't let the money lose more value!
Alice, we're running out of time!  This money is practically disappearing before our eyes.  I'm proposing 53/47 in your favor, let's close this deal and both come out ahead.
